com.mlt.desktop.control

Class Stage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Stage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dialog, Frame

    public abstract class Stage
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple stage (window) implementation detached from all the window, dialog.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Stage.Adapter
      Window listener adapter.
      static interface  Stage.Listener
      Listener to window events.
